channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: German economic expectations slump for first time in a year
Top tech analyst Mark Mahaney gives his new picks and names a surprising potential underperformer
item.description: Mahaney bumped up Alphabet and Uber on his list of top large cap tech picks. Shopify was the newest addition on the list.

item.title: S&P 500 futures tick higher, Bank of America pops after earnings beat: Live updates
item.description: U.S. stock futures were slightly higher on Tuesday after the Dow Jones Industrial Average closed at a record high.

item.title: Four deep value stocks flagged as this asset class seeks a comeback
item.description: Miller Value Deep Value Strategy flags small-cap diamonds in the food, energy and media sectors.

item.title: Trump lauded at Republican convention, his first public appearance since assassination attempt
item.description: Trump wore a bandage over his right ear, but appeared to be in good spirits.As he walked into the convention, the Republican crowd erupted into cheering.

item.title: Bank of America tops estimates on better-than-expected investment banking
item.description: CEO Brian Moynihan told investors in April that net interest income would bottom in the second quarter.

item.title: UnitedHealth‚Äôs stock reverses lower as higher costs offset an earnings beat
item.description: UnitedHealth Group‚Äôs stock fell toward their first loss in seven sessions Tuesday, after the health insurer‚Äôs second-quarter medical and cyberattack-related costs that topped expectations, to offset earnings that beat forecasts.

item.title: Trump Media shares close up more than 30% after assassination attempt
item.description: The stock's rise comes two days after the attempted assassination of former President Donald Trump, the company's majority shareholder.

item.title: 'God help Ukraine': How JD Vance's VP nomination will cause chills in Kyiv
item.description: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump's decision to pick Sen. JD Vance as his vice presidential running mate will have sent chills down spines in Kyiv.

item.title: Inflation won‚Äôt fall to 2% but stocks should get a lift from a growing economy
item.description: Good news for the U.S. economy, plus this being a presidential election year, set the stage for higher equity prices.

item.title: Biden says 'time to put Trump in the bulls-eye' remark was a mistake, doubles down on reelection bid
item.description: Donald Trump suffered a minor ear injury after an assassination attempt at his Pennsylvania rally that killed one attendee and critically injured two others.

item.title: Gareth Southgate steps down as England manager after Euro 2024 final defeat to Spain
item.description: The news comes two days after England's Euro 2024 final defeat to Spain.

item.title: RFK Jr. to receive Secret Service protection after Trump assassination attempt
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. previously requested Secret Service protection, and Donald Trump endorsed that bid after getting shot at during a Pennsylvania rally.

item.title: Deutsche Bank criticized by German regulator for financial reporting error
item.description: Deutsche Bank incorrectly disclosed deferred tax assets in its 2019 financial statement, German regulator BaFin said Tuesday.
